languages.text: "Где юнцы берут напором, старики берут знанием. Уверен, даже ксеносы должны понимать, как важен опыт!"
"Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"
languages.original_text: "Где юнцы берут напором, старики берут знанием. Уверен, даже ксеносы должны понимать, как важен опыт!"

traits.locale_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even xenos must understand the importance of experience!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even xenos must understand the importance of experience!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even xenos must understand the importance of experience!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even xenos must understand the importance of experience!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “年轻意味着活力，而年迈意味着知识。我相信，哪怕是活了很久的异形，也一定能明白经验的重要性！”
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: “年轻意味着活力，而年迈意味着知识。我相信，哪怕是异形，也一定能明白经验的重要性！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La juventud cuenta con vigor, pero la vejez trae conocimiento. ¡Seguro que hasta los xenos más longevos entienden la importancia de la experiencia!».
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: «La juventud cuenta con vigor, pero la vejez trae conocimiento. ¡Seguro que hasta los xenos entienden la importancia de la experiencia!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「若さには活力があるが、老いには知識が伴うものだ。長生きした異種族であろうとも、経験の重要性は理解しておろう」
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: 「若さには活力があるが、老いには知識が伴うものだ。異種族であろうとも、経験の重要性は理解しておろう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Jugend hat den Elan auf ihrer Seite, das Alter vertraut hingegen auf Wissen. Ich bin sicher, selbst langlebige Xenos verstehen die Bedeutung von Erfahrung."
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Jugend hat den Elan auf ihrer Seite, das Alter vertraut hingegen auf Wissen. Ich bin sicher, selbst Xenos verstehen die Bedeutung von Erfahrung."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « La jeunesse a le privilège de la vigueur, quand l'âge a l'avantage de la connaissance. Je suis sûr que même les xénos aguerris comprennent l'importance de l'expérience ! »
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: « La jeunesse a le privilège de la vigueur, quand l'âge a l'avantage de la connaissance. Je suis sûr que même les xénos comprennent l'importance de l'expérience ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

languages.text: "Enerji gençlikte olabilir ama bilgelik de yaşta. Uzun ömürlü bir zenonun bile tecrübenin önemine haiz olduğuna eminim!"
languages.original_text: "Youth has vigour on its side, but age has knowledge. I'm sure even a long-lived xenos must understand the importance of experience!"

traits.locale_text: "Enerji gençlikte olabilir ama bilgelik de yaşta. Uzun ömürlü bir zenonun bile tecrübenin önemine haiz olduğuna eminim!"
